name: Space buddies
description:
Space buddies is my first fully independently made game.

It's a 2-player single screen co-op game. 

Each player takes control of an asteroid and together you try to navigate the asteroid field in search of the end.

But be warned as everything you touch destroys you and floating too far from your partner will also end the search for you too.

I will probably revisit this game to add more levels and add some more overall polish.

You can always contact for me for feedback on this e-mail adress:

liam.vandenbroeck@hotmail.com

All feedback is welcome and thank you for playing.
